programme.title: Sporting Heroes
programme.sub-title: Sporting Heroes: Gary Newbon Interviews Naseem Hamed.
programme.desc: An interview with the former boxer, who reigned supreme in the featherweight division in the latter half of the 1990s, but came unstuck when he faced Marco Antonio Barrera. Hamed first won the WBO title in 1995 when he dethroned Steve Robinson, and also went on to claim the IBF and WBC belts before suffering the sole loss of his career to Barrera in Las Vegas in 2001, and retired after one final bout against Manuel Calvo in 2002

programme.title: Live - Wimbledon 2017
programme.desc: Coverage of day eight at the All England Club, where the ladies' quarter-final singles matches are due to take place. All four of the last-eight matches at last year's tournament were settled in straight sets, and it was the unseeded Elena Vesnina who claimed the win of the round as she eliminated 18th seed Dominika Cibulkova. Meanwhile, there were also victories for Serena Williams, Angelique Kerber and Venus Williams, over Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova , Simona Halep and Yaroslava Shvedova respectively

programme.title: Live - Wimbledon 2017
programme.desc: Coverage of day nine at the All England Club, where the mens' quarter-final singles matches are due to take place. Both Roger Federer and Andy Murray were involved in epic five-set encounters at this stage of last year's competition, with the Swiss being pushed all the way by Marin Cilic before eventually prevailing 6-7, 4-6, 6-3, 7-6, 6-3, while Murray registered a 7-6, 6-1, 3-6, 4-6, 6-1 win over Jo-Wilfried Tsonga. Meanwhile, there were also victories for Milos Raonic and Tomas Berdych over Sam Querrey and Lucas Pouille respectively

programme.desc: Coverage of day 10 at the All England Club, where the ladies' semi-final singles matches are due to take place. programme.title: Kitajska liga: Beijing Gouan - Gunagzhou Evergrande
programme.desc: V najštevilčnejši državi na planetu iz leta v letu več vlagajo v nogomet. programme.title: Live! Grand Slam Wimbledon 2017: 10. dan
programme.desc: Wimbledonska sveta trava je znova v ospredju zanimanja teniških ljubiteljev, saj je na sporedu tretji letošnji turnir za grand slam, ki velja hkrati tudi za najprestižnejšega v teniškem svetu. Pri dekletih je bila pred letom dni najboljša Serena Williams, ki zaradi nosečnosti ne bo branila zmage, zato je lov na sveti gral odprt, pri moških naslov brani domači matador Andy Murray. programme.sub-title: Phil Mickelson - Hall of Fame Career
programme.desc: Conclusion. A chat with Phil Mickelson to discuss his Hall of Fame career. (cc)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.desc: PH Harpreet Brar guides Steve Hornady on a quest to collect a fringe-eared oryx in Tanzania. Brent Hoskins is enjoying his first safari in Nuanetsi, and Bill Jones is hot on the trail of cape buffalo in Mozambique

programme.title: Fresh Tracks With Randy Newberg

programme.title: The Honey Brake Experience
programme.desc: A look into the everyday life of a Head Waterfowl Guide and what it takes to be ready for the opener

programme.desc: Blue wing teal at Rocky Creek Retrievers with Steve Biggers. Terry and the crew travel to El Campo, Texas to bust blue wings over flooded fields. Along for the action is long time friend, Joe Beal and Kyle Wintersteen of Delta Waterfowl

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: A chase behind the shrimp boats looking for blackfin tuna

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Bonefish and baby tarpon fishing in the Florida Keys

programme.title: Backwoods Life

programme.desc: Jon Baker and Keith Hilty cruise the river for caribou in the hills of Alaska's vast wilderness

programme.desc: The crew is on the road again hunting unfamiliar ground in North Dakota. Spot-and-stalk action in the AM and river bottom tree stand hunting in the evenings

programme.title: Monster Bucks *
